item.title: plsql
item.description: 下载 plsql instantclient-basic-11.2.0.4 注册 product code： ke4tv8t5jtxz493kl8s2nn3t6xgngcmgf3 serial Number： 264452 password: xs374ca Preferences Oracle Connection Oracle Home C:\soft\instantclient_11_2 OCI library C:\soft\instantclient_11_2\oci.dll Logon History Store with password Other Updates Never News Never 乱码 查询编码 select userenv('language') from dual; 设置环境变量 NLS_LANG SIMPLIFIED CHINESE_CHINA.ZHS16GBK 重启plsql
